Action.title: Edge of Tomorrow
Action.description: A soldier relives the same day over and over, fighting an alien invasion until he learns how to defeat them.

Action.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
Action.description: In a post-apocalyptic desert, Max joins forces with Furiosa to escape a tyrant and his army.

Comedy.title: The Office Reunion
Comedy.description: The Dunder Mifflin crew comes back together for an unexpected reunion filled with chaos and laughs.

Comedy.title: Superbad
Comedy.description: Two high school friends try to buy alcohol for a party, leading to a night of wild misadventures.
